content: Just turned 22 and feeling like a canvas with endless possibilities. From finance to crypto, my journey's been a wild sketch. Now, I'm ready to paint my career with strokes of art and tech. 🎨💻 #22ndBirthday #ArtMeetsTech
raw_content: Just turned 22 and reflecting on the journey so far. From my first internship in finance to diving into crypto, every step has been a learning curve. Now, I'm ready to blend my love for art with tech, aiming for a career where creativity meets innovation. #22ndBirthday #ArtMeetsTech
